publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-950 Ben Wallace: Dunkirk 60th Anniversary-That the Parliament acknowledges the bravery and heroism of all those involved in the Dunkirk evacuation, expresses its deep gratitude for their actions and passes on its full support and best wishes for all those involved in the 60th anniversary commemoration. Supported by: Bill Aitken*, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*, Mr Brian Monteith*, Bristow Muldoon*
S1M-950 Dunkirk 60th Anniversary (lodged on 2 June 2000) David Mundell*, Donald Gorrie*, Linda Fabiani*, Mr Michael McMahon*
S1M-950 Dunkirk 60th Anniversary (lodged on 2 June 2000) David McLetchie*, Mr Keith Harding*, Dr Elaine Murray*, Mr Jamie McGrigor*, Andrew Wilson*, Dr Richard Simpson*, Brian Adam*
